**Google stock**



```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
library(tidyquant)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
end_date <- Sys.Date()

# Calculate start_date as end_date minus 10 years
start_date <- end_date %m-% years(100)

getSymbols("GOOGL", from = start_date,
           to = end_date,warnings = FALSE,
           auto.assign = TRUE)

df1 <- as.data.frame(GOOGL)
df1$date <- rownames(df1)

df2 <- df1 %>% filter(date > end_date %m-% years(10))
df3 <- df1 %>% filter(date > end_date %m-% years(1))



```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false



plot1 <- plot_ly(data = df1, x = ~date, y = ~GOOGL.Adjusted, type = "scatter", mode = "lines", name = "Samsung stock") %>%
  layout(title = paste("Stock Price for Alphabet"),
         xaxis = list(title = "Date",
                      nticks = 5),
         yaxis = list(title = "Price")) 

plot2 <- plot_ly(data = df2, x = ~date, y = ~GOOGL.Adjusted, type = "scatter", mode = "lines", name = "Samsung stock") %>%
  layout(title = paste("Stock Price for Alphabet"),
         xaxis = list(title = "Date",
                      nticks = 5),
         yaxis = list(title = "Price")) 

plot3 <- plot_ly(data = df3, x = ~date, y = ~GOOGL.Adjusted, type = "scatter", mode = "lines", name = "Samsung stock") %>%
  layout(title = paste("Stock Price for Alphabet"),
         xaxis = list(title = "Date",
                      nticks = 5),
         yaxis = list(title = "Price")) 

```

::: {layout="[[1,1], [1]]"}
```{r}
#| label: Stock Price since inception
#| echo: false
plot1
```

```{r}
#| label: Stock Price the last 10 years
#| echo: false
plot2
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: Stock Price the last 1 years
plot3
```
